verses.verse: <S%G2258><s%> And Were <S%G1161><s%> Drawing Near <S%G1448><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Murmured <S%G1234><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Receives <S%G4327><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Eats With <S%G4906><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G2036><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable, <S%G3778><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Hundred <S%G1540><s%> Sheep, <S%G4263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Lost <S%G622><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Leaves <S%G2641><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ninety Nine <S%G1768><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Goes <S%G4198><s%> After <S%G1909><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Lost, <S%G622><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> He Find <S%G2147><s%> It? <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found It <S%G2147><s%> He Lays It <S%G2007><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5606><s%> His Shoulders <S%G1438><s%> Rejoicing, <S%G5463><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> He Calls Together <S%G4779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Friends <S%G5384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbours, <S%G1069><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> Rejoice With <S%G4796><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> I Have Found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4263><s%> My Sheep <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Was Lost. <S%G622><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Sinner <S%G268><s%> Repenting, More <S%G3340><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> Ninety Nine <S%G1768><s%> Righteous Ones, <S%G1342><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Of Repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Drachmas <S%G1406><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Ten, <S%G1176><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> She Should Lose <S%G622><s%> Drachma <S%G1406><s%> <S%G1520><s%> One, <S%G3780><s%> Lights Not <S%G681><s%> A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sweeps <S%G4563><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeks <S%G2212><s%> Carefully <S%G1960><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3755><s%> She Find It? <S%G2147><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found It <S%G2147><s%> She Calls Together <S%G4779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Friends <S%G5384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbours, <S%G1069><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rejoice With <S%G4796><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> I Have Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Drachma <S%G1406><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Lost. <S%G622><s%>

Thus, <S%G3779><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> There Is <S%G1096><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Repenting. <S%G3340><s%>
<S%G2036><s%> And He Said, <S%G1161><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Sons; <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Younger <S%G3501><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To His Father, <S%G3962><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Falling To Me <S%G1911><s%> Portion <S%G3313><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Property. <S%G3776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Divided <S%G1244><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living. <S%G979><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ' After <S%G3326><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Having Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> All <S%G537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Younger <S%G3501><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Went Away <S%G589><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Country <S%G5561><s%> Distant, <S%G3117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Wasted <S%G1287><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3776><s%> His Property, <S%G846><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Dissolutely. <S%G811><s%>

Having Spent <S%G1159><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> There Arose <S%G1096><s%> A Famine <S%G3042><s%> Violent <S%G2478><s%> Throughout <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5561><s%> That Country, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Be In Want. <S%G5302><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> He Joined Himself <S%G2853><s%> To One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Citizens <S%G4177><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5561><s%> Of That Country, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Sent <S%G3992><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G68><s%> His Fields <S%G846><s%> To Feed <S%G1006><s%> Swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Longing <S%G1937><s%> To Fill <S%G1072><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2836><s%> His Belly <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husks <S%G2769><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Were Eating <S%G2068><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Swine; <S%G5519><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> How Many <S%G4214><s%> Hired Servants <S%G3407><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of My <S%G3450><s%> Have Abundance <S%G4052><s%> Of Bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G1473><s%> And I 1161 CONJ With Famine 3042 N-DSM Am Perishing? 622 V-PMI-1S

Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> I Will Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Say <S%G2046><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I Have Sinned <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Thee; <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Am I 1510 V-PXI-1S Worthy 514 A-NSM To Be Called 2564 V-APN 5207 N-NSM Thy Son : 4675 P-2GS Make 4160 V-AAM-2S Me 3165 P-1AS As 5613 ADV One 1520 A-ASM 3588 T-GPM 3407 A-GPM Of Thy Hired Servants. 4675 P-2GS

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> He Went <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> His. <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2089><s%> But Yet <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Far <S%G3112><s%> Being Distant <S%G568><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Moved With Compassion, <S%G4697><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Running <S%G5143><s%> Fell <S%G1968><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5137><s%> His Neck <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ardently Kissed <S%G2705><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I Have Sinned <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Am I 1510 V-PXI-1S Worthy 514 A-NSM To Be Called 2564 V-APN 5207 N-NSM Thy Son. 4675 P-2GS

Said <S%G2036><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen, <S%G846><s%> Bring Out <S%G1627><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Robe <S%G4749><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Best, <S%G4413><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Clothe <S%G1746><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> A Ring <S%G1146><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sandals <S%G5266><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet; <S%G4228><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Brought <S%G5342><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Calf <S%G3448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fattened <S%G4618><s%> Kill It, <S%G2380><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Eating <S%G5315><s%> Let Us Be Merry : <S%G2165><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Alive Again; <S%G326><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lost <S%G622><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Found. <S%G2147><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Began <S%G756><s%> To Be Merry. <S%G2165><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And Was <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elder <S%G4245><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Field; <S%G68><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Coming Up <S%G2064><s%> He Drew Near <S%G1448><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> He Heard <S%G191><s%> Music <S%G4858><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dancing. <S%G5525><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called Near <S%G4341><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> Of His Servants, <S%G846><s%> He Inquired <S%G4441><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Might Be <S%G1498><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother <S%G4675><s%> Is Come, <S%G2240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Killed <S%G2380><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Calf <S%G3448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fattened, <S%G4618><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Safe And Well <S%G5198><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Received. <S%G618><s%>

He Was Angry <S%G3710><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Willing <S%G2309><s%> To Go In. <S%G1525><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Having Gone <S%G1831><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Father His, <S%G3962><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> So Many <S%G5118><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> I Serve <S%G1398><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Transgressed I, <S%G3928><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Didst Thou Give <S%G1325><s%> A Kid <S%G2056><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5384><s%> My Friends <S%G3450><s%> I Might Make Merry; <S%G2165><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Thy Son <S%G4675><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Devoured <S%G2719><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Living <S%G979><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Harlots <S%G4204><s%> Came, <S%G2064><s%> Thou Didst Kill <S%G2380><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Calf <S%G3448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fattened. <S%G4618><s%>

<S%G2165><s%> But To Make Merry <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> Was Becoming, <S%G1163><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother <S%G4675><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Alive Again; <S%G326><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lost <S%G622><s%> , Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Found. <S%G2147><s%>
